p.k: Hosted by Australian motorsport legend Sandy Bowman. In 2013 Sandy Bowman and his navigator Daniel Hardman destroyed their off road race car in a massive crash
p.d: Hosted by Australian motorsport legend Sandy Bowman. In 2013 Sandy Bowman and his navigator Daniel Hardman destroyed their off road race car in a massive crash. They have set out to build a new one, which is a huge undertaking, so to stay entertained Sandy and Daniel decided to compete in other forms of racing whilst the new car is being developed. Every episode Sandy and Daniel enter different events and wholeheartedly get into the spirit of that form of racing.
